Authors: Oscario A., Sriherlambang B., Akbar A.
Title: Building a positive brand image through advertisement: Case study: Insurance advertising in comic strip format for children
Affiliations: School of Design, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Oscario, A., School of Design, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Sriherlambang, B., School of Design, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Akbar, A., School of Design, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia
Abstract: Advertising is facing a very tough challenge when it has to communicate a product/brand that is perceived negative by its market. The positive product or brand image is crucial in influencing the target market perception in hope to create a new demand. Using a qualitative case study method, the research analyzed how a brand tries to build a positive image in its market’s mind through an advertisement. The research analyzed the uncommon communication strategy from an advertisement of an insurance product that is still perceived negative by Indonesian market. © 2017 American Scientific Publishers All rights reserved.
